what_the_night_will_bring.title: What The Night Will Bring
what_the_night_will_bring.trivia: CS was obsessed with this song he heard at the store he used to work at. He set up a bounty for whoever found it!

canyon.title: CANYON.MID
canyon.trivia: The full title of this song is {i}Trip Through the Grand Canyon.{/i}

summer_clearance_sale.title: サマークリアランスセール

scales_of_joy.title: scales of joy.mod
scales_of_joy.trivia: "This song makes me feel whack!" -- Mika

hohsis_theme.title: Funeral March of a Marionette
hohsis_theme.trivia: Also known as the intro theme for {i}Alfred Hitchcock.{/i}

super_friendly.title: Super Friendly
super_friendly.trivia: From before he started using AI...

time_for_a_smackdown.title: Time for a Smackdown!
time_for_a_smackdown.trivia: Originally called "Office Puncher" in the game files. We were going to name all of the songs internally after what was happening in that part of the game.

beautiful_hills.title: Beautiful Hills
beautiful_hills.trivia: The Home Savers Foundation Repair company used this as background music in the commercial that CS turned into a YTP.

card_castle.title: Card Castle
card_castle.trivia: This is one of the earliest tracks made for {i}Deltarune{/i} by Robert.

basement.title: Basement
basement.trivia: "This song is just scary. I don't want to listen to it anymore :(" -- Mika

stal.title: stal
stal.trivia: The unofficial theme song for Arceus.

moongazer.title: Moongazer
moongazer.trivia: "The song from the jail breakout... I broke out of jail once!" -- Mika

onett.title: Onett Theme
onett.trivia: "Despite trying multiple times, I have never beaten {i}Earthbound.{/i} Pakoo hates me for this." -- Mika

star_spangled_banner.title: The Star Spangled Banner
star_spangled_banner.trivia: While Tate was adamant about finding the actual orchestra that performed this rendition, they were ultimately overruled. It {i}is{/i} funnier to just credit this song to THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.

buy_something.title: Buy Something Will Ya!
buy_something.trivia: Despite taking place in Canada, Ges barely appears in this route... What's up with that?

passport.title: PASSPORT.MID
passport.trivia: This song was created to promote Passport Designs, Inc., which made some early music production software.

school.title: School
school.trivia: I made the {i}Card Castle{/i} fact up, sorry...

circus.title: Circus
circus.trivia: This song plays at the carnival in AI Route, despite not seeing the carnival in {i}Deltarune{/i} at the time of writing this...

cliffs.title: Cliffs
cliffs.trivia:
"Why use all the Toby Fox songs for AI Route? This the alternate universe where Toby Fox and Sebastian Wolf switch places?
It's because I was being lazy." -- Digi

friendship.title: Friendship
friendship.trivia: One of the most wholesome songs in the whole of {i}Deltarune{/i} and {i}CSBIII{/i}.

good_eatin.title: Good Eatin'
good_eatin.trivia: "Pakoo really liked Pizza Game (I forgot the name) when developing some sections of {i}CSBIII{/i}, but now he hasn't thought of that game in about a year." -- Mika

supernova.title: Supernova
supernova.trivia: The Linus Tech Tips YouTube channel has used this track as an intro theme since 2015. It was first featured in {a=https://youtu.be/Av6u9KYsSDk?si=GWTaPxa9bhIveBWA}{i}Obutto Revolution Gaming Cockpit - The ULTIMATE Workstation Computer Setup?{/i}{/a}

airport_counter.title: Airport Counter
airport_counter.trivia: "Despite me begging many times, Pakoo has not yet properly played Animal Crossing: New Horizons... sadly." -- Mika

hired_guns.title: Hired Guns
hired_guns.trivia: "Pakoo added a lot of tracker music to the game. I am very neutral on them." -- Mika

undyne.title: Undyne
undyne.trivia: "I like watching LTT, so watching this scene makes me feel... empathy?" -- Mika

atarashii_kaze.title: 新しい風
atarashii_kaze.trivia:
Romanized Title: Atarashii Kaze
English Title: New Wind

police_station.title: Police Station
police_station.trivia: One of the only songs where the title of the original song matches the location the characters are in!

echoing.title: Echoing
echoing.trivia:
The first song that was modified for the game.
"This song makes me feel weird!" -- Mika

kill_cops.title: Echoing?
kill_cops.trivia: One of few songs that still keeps the original internal name.

insane_personalities.title: Insane Personalities
insane_personalities.trivia: Apparently used in the {i}CSB{/i} "No Mercy" route... what a bunch of copycats these "DPN" are...

danger_mystery.title: Danger Mystery
danger_mystery.trivia: Originally, CS and Arceus were supposed to get arrested for public urination. Good thing we fired whoever wrote that nightmare.

bun_guster.title: Bun Guster
bun_guster.trivia: "To impress Pakoo, I put the entire {i}Lucky Star{/i} soundtrack in the {i}GTA: Online{/i} radio. I do like the music though!" -- Mika

happy_roaming.title: Happy Roaming
happy_roaming.trivia: "Everyone likes this song, including me... obviously." -- Mika

facing_worlds.title: Facing Worlds
facing_worlds.trivia:
This song was created for {i}Unreal Tournament{/i}, an arena shooter created by Epic MegaGames. In fact, you can still listen to this song in {i}Fortnite{/i} when you listen to the car's radio.
"This song makes me feel existentialism!" -- Mika

broken_sky.title: BATTLE UNDER A BROKEN SKY
broken_sky.trivia: Baker knows more about this song, ask them! @Baker please add details.

take_trip.title: Take a Trip from Me
take_trip.trivia: The unofficial theme song for the Archival ending.

everybody_wants.title: Everybody Wants To Rule The World
everybody_wants.trivia: "Pakoo's favorite song, I like it a lot too." -- Mika

albuquerque.title: Albuquerque
albuquerque.trivia: This entire song was added for an airplane bit that you don't even see in the main game. That's right, the biggest song in the whole game is just wasting space waiting to be played by no one...

wool_gloves.title: Wool Gloves
wool_gloves.trivia: {i}Beats to Play In Your Tokyo Apartment That Doesn't Have a Kitchen for Some Reason.{/i}

conflict.title: Conflict
conflict.trivia: This entire section is completely innacurate to {i}Hell's Kitchen...{/i} we should probably remaster this some day!

tumultuous.title: Tumultuous
tumultuous.trivia: Read text on the last one...

lisbon_fever.title: Lisbon Fever
lisbon_fever.trivia: There was supposed to be a minigame here, but they were too lazy to make one I guess.

yuuka_town.title: village_1_JP013BM
yuuka_town.trivia: Available in the Twilight Shrine: Japanese Resource Pack for RPG Maker.

automatic_love.title: Automatic Love
automatic_love.trivia:
Royalty free song :thingking:
Royalty free song, Japan :woagh!:

bakamitai.title: ばかみたい
bakamitai.trivia:
Romanized Title: Baka Mitai
English Title: I've Been A Fool

chase.title: The Chase
chase.trivia: This is usually the chase song.

neko_to_sanpo.title: ネコと散歩
neko_to_sanpo.trivia:
Romanized Title: Neko To Sanpo
English Title: Walking With Cats

muumin_tani_fuyu.title: ムーミン谷・冬
muumin_tani_fuyu.trivia:
Romanized Title: Muumin Tani Fuyu
English Title: Winter In Moominvalley

snufkin.title: Snufkin The Traveler
snufkin.trivia: "I know nothing about {i}Moomin,{/i} besides the fact that Dodie made one of the songs for it!" -- Mika

lady_of_the_cold.title: Lady Of The Cold
lady_of_the_cold.trivia: I don't know why this has separate album art...

afternoon_hills.title: Afternoon Hills
afternoon_hills.trivia: Feels like this song would play at a shop in {i}Lucky Star{/i} and {i}Yuru Camp{/i} and {i}K-On!{/i} and...

xddcc.title: XDDCC
xddcc.trivia: When {i}CSBIII{/i} was released, many tracks did not yet have album art. This is one of the more notable entries. The pilot episode for {i}The Amazing Digital Circus{/i} was only days old when Country Route was being written.

mm_select.title: Mm Select
mm_select.trivia: The unofficial theme song for Billy Mays. The original internal name was "CS Did Something."

home_depot.title: Let's Do This
home_depot.trivia: {a=https://youtu.be/KCqeX9m9gko?si=42thjKxDXN36SRwt&t=986}Famously played when cleaning an evil mastermind's lair.{/a}

candle_world.title: Candle World
candle_world.trivia: "Pakoo has tried to get me to play {i}Yume Nikki{/i} many many times, but it makes me very uncomfortable and anxious." -- Mika

blazing_corridor.title: Blazing Corridor
blazing_corridor.trivia: This is more of a sound effect than a song, but it {i}is{/i} listed as a song in the offical {i}Yume Nikki{/i} OST.

taiikusai_desu_yo.title: 体育祭ですよ
taiikusai_desu_yo.trivia:
Romanized Title: Taiikusai Desu Yo
English Title: It's A Sports Festival

track_4.title: Track 4
track_4.trivia: Speed this up by 50% and you get yourself an {i}Ace Combat{/i} prep screen song.

funiculi_holiday.title: Funiculi Holiday
funiculi_holiday.trivia: Why Mafia isn't a fucking aesthetic: a thread.

speedy_comet.title: Speedy Comet
speedy_comet.trivia: Song for the first minigame ever made for {i}CSBIII!{/i}

breakout.title: Breakout
breakout.trivia: The old outro theme for {i}Scott The Woz.{/i}

fourside.title: The Metropolis of Fourside
fourside.trivia: The best song in {i}Earthbound.{/i} The {a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Cazb8GDxJ4}{i}Smash version{/a} is great, too!

pokey.title: Pokey's House
pokey.trivia: Pakoo was very mean and made this Digi's intro song.

rude_buster.title: Rude Buster
rude_buster.trivia: We need to add {i}Ruder Buster{/i} to this game. That song goes crazy insane.

park_theme.title: Park Theme
park_theme.trivia: Someone should make a show about Parks. Maybe Recreation, as well?

hohsis_remix.title: Alfred's Theme
hohsis_remix.trivia: We got Eminem to compose this song for us. Thank you @Bornana42!

billy_mix.title: Billy's Mix
billy_mix.trivia: A collection of Billy Mays remixes and YTPMVs.

ac_title.title: New Leaf Title Theme
ac_title.trivia: The only person I have ever seen play this game is ProJared.

dealin_dope.title: Dealin Dope
dealin_dope.trivia: Do not deal dope, it doesn't look good on resumes.

hit_me_with_your_best_shot.title: Hit Me With Your Best Shot
hit_me_with_your_best_shot.trivia: This absolutely awful MIDI of {i}Hit Me With Your Best Shot{/i} made Digi laugh so hard that they put it in the game. The computer used to record this MIDI must have been lagging, because the percussion is nearly constantly out of sync.

hightop.title: Hightop
hightop.trivia: {i}Beats To Make Your First Album To!{/i}

everlong.title: Everlong
everlong.trivia: "If I had a band it'd be called the Food Fighters, and we'd talk about food in our songs." -- Mika

local_forecast.title: Local Forecast
local_forecast.trivia: "Feels like I'm in an elevator." -- Mika

now_what.title: Now What? 1
now_what.trivia: "Pretty sure I've heard this song when riding in the car with Pakoo." -- Mika

happy_rock.title: Happy Rock
happy_rock.trivia: The unofficial theme song of {i}Grab That Auto 5.{/i}

energetic_rock.title: Energetic Rock
energetic_rock.trivia: The most generic song in the world.

fnaf_6.title: Smashing Windshields
fnaf_6.trivia: Tate, who has never interacted with {i}FNAF{/i} in their life, had a hell of a time finding the actual title of this song. For the longest time, this track was just referred to as "Racing Minigame Song".

france.title: Guillotine World
france.trivia: The internal name for this track is "france".

dragon_castle.title: Dragon Castle
dragon_castle.trivia: Type of music Dragon would listen to... I think.

gold_room.title: You're At A Ball In The Gold Room
gold_room.trivia: Hotel lobby music hasn't been a thing in decades.

sweet_victory.title: Sweet Victory
sweet_victory.trivia: We were robbed of this song for the Super Bowl.

dig_this.title: Dig This
dig_this.trivia: "Okay, I have definitely heard this song while riding in Pakoo's car." -- Mika

exotic.title: Exotic
exotic.trivia: Second most generic song in the world.

creative_exercise.title: Creative Exercise
creative_exercise.trivia: The person in the ad for the {a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ok8hd9D6ImM}Nintendo Switch version{/a} is really funny!

nordic_report_1.title: Nordic Report 1
nordic_report_1.trivia: Fighting for the right side of history!

nordic_report_2.title: Nordic Report 2
nordic_report_2.trivia: Sometimes, you fight for the wrong side.

Lowbudget_song.title: Lowbudget Song
Lowbudget_song.trivia: At least the title is accurate.

cp_violation.title: CP Violation
cp_violation.trivia: CP in this context stands for "Civil Protection."

mm_complete.title: Mm Complete
mm_complete.trivia: Feels like something I'd hear in McPixel.

compulsion_to_obey.title: Compulsion To Obey
compulsion_to_obey.trivia: I don't feel the compulsion to do anything.

for_the_people.title: For The People
for_the_people.trivia: Get on the ground? More like {a=https://youtu.be/Eca1peC7OHc?si=bzehdyB2jZwigYaj&t=314}diebastard{/a}.

tuna_fish.title: Tuna Fish
tuna_fish.trivia: Give a man a tuna and he'll eat for a day... teach a man to do music and he'll make this.

full_rulle_med_klas.title: Full Rulle Med Klas
full_rulle_med_klas.trivia: "I don't remember diners in the 50's sounding like this." -- Elizabeth

dense_woods_b.title: Dense Woods B
dense_woods_b.trivia: It's so creepy... fitting for the Aria section.

desert_dawn.title: Desert Dawn
desert_dawn.trivia: "Aria vs. The Cops. Why do I feel like that'll happen one day...?" -- Mika

dinerfight.title: Diner Fight
dinerfight.trivia: The second part of {i}Full Rulle Med Klas,{/i} which kept the original naming scheme.

la_by_night.title: L.A. By Night
la_by_night.trivia: If L.A. doesn't play this at night, then why even bother going?

thousand_march.title: Thousand March
thousand_march.trivia:
What is the price of a mile...?
"About 13 pence as of 23/10/2025" - Arceus

triage_at_dawn.title: Triage At Dawn
triage_at_dawn.trivia: The saddest song in the whole world.

prophet_2001.title: Prophet 2001
prophet_2001.trivia: Turns out, Jesus {i}did{/i} come back! But everyone was busy with something else...

prophetpart2.title: Prophet 2001 (Part 2)
prophetpart2.trivia: Copguy EX did not stand a chance.

weapon_of_choice.title: Weapon Of Choice
weapon_of_choice.trivia:
When he was in college, the real CS made a music video for this song. The ending movie in Friend Route is a direct tribute to that video.
{a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q4bTonemz2M}Here's a side-by-side comparison!{/a}

honk_song.title: Honk Song
honk_song.trivia: You can faintly hear the {i}{a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kfNI59iG_6E}Cerealcore 2{/a}{/i} theme song here!

wayward_wanderer.title: Wayward Wanderer
wayward_wanderer.trivia: "I have been informed that Gnomes play a part in this game." -- Mika

mis_leader.title: MisLeader
mis_leader.trivia: As described by Pakoo, "the weird Aria music," and as asked by Mika, "who listens to this?!"

melancholy.title: Melancholy
melancholy.trivia: Created by Aria's friend! One of many.

trash_zone.title: Tubular Trash Zone
trash_zone.trivia: "Throwing a brick into washing machines have been my favorite kinds of videos." -- Mika

brick_by_dick.title: Brick By Brick (Suck My Dick)
brick_by_dick.trivia: {a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=95_33ItUC9k}Louder than a DJ farting all night.{/a}

tunnely_shimbers.title: Tunnely Shimbers
tunnely_shimbers.trivia: {i}Five Nights at LEGO: Help Not Wanted{/i}

penthouse.title: Al's Penthouse
penthouse.trivia: Genuinely, this song has no right going as hard as it does.

laurel_palace.title: Laurel Palace
laurel_palace.trivia: "This song is stuck in my head from rewatching the Jerma stream too many times." -- Mika

lancer.title: Lancer
lancer.trivia: The pointy-headed will say "toothpaste," and then "boy."

price_right.title: Price Is Right Theme
price_right.trivia: You won the priz-- wait no, CS did.

airport.title: Airport Infiltration
airport.trivia: Being at the airport is way too nerve-wracking. What if they figure out I'm on the no-fly list?!

clownpiece.title: Pierrot of the Star Spangled Banner
clownpiece.trivia: All CS had to do was stick to the script!

goodbye_summer_hello_winter.title: Goodbye Summer, Hello Winter
goodbye_summer_hello_winter.trivia: HE DID NOT CHEAT ON HIS WIFE GOD DAMN IT

goodbye_speedrun.title: Goodbye Speedrun, Hello WR
goodbye_speedrun.trivia: Tate thought it would be funny to have a sped-up version of the credits for {i}Speedrun.{/i}

upon_me.title: Upon Me
upon_me.trivia: "Bronson is not even a real place anyway. Show me it on a map, a real map. None of the Google Maps bullshit." -- Mika

lets_hear_spring.title: Let's Hear My Baby: Spring Remix
lets_hear_spring.trivia: Pakoo's edited MOD of {i}Let's Hear My Baby.{/i}

alien_atmosphere.title: Alien Atmosphere
alien_atmosphere.trivia: This would've been funnier when the backrooms were still relevant and interesting... so, like, for 30 minutes.

ten_feet_away.title: 10 Feet Away
ten_feet_away.trivia: One of, if not the only song in {i}CSB{/i} to have the stems of the song get progressively added until the full song is completed.

get_the_funk.title: Get The Funk
get_the_funk.trivia: {i}Songs To Sharpen Your Pencil To: Vol. XVII{/i}

sneak_theme.title: Snooping Around As Usual
sneak_theme.trivia: Man, these guys are some kind of sneak... kings.

interference2.title: Interference
interference2.trivia: "This song makes me feel energized!" -- Mika

tv_hall_of_fame.title: Hall of Fame
tv_hall_of_fame.trivia: "Play this at my Oscar winning speech!" -- Mika

polar_express.title: The Polar Express - Main Title
polar_express.trivia: "This song brings me legit memories." -- Mika

sleigh_ride.title: Sleigh Ride
sleigh_ride.trivia: "At least I'll have good Christmas music this year!" -- Mika

lets_hear_winter.title: Let's Hear My Baby: Christmas Remix
lets_hear_winter.trivia: Pakoo's edited MOD of {i}Let's Hear My Baby.{/i}

teeth_dust.title: Teeth Dust In The Stronghold
teeth_dust.trivia: CS throws a party! Let's hope he doesn't do anything with the {a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rklpVaVwnP0}bathroom door.{/a}

hotel_disbelief.title: Can You Really Call This A Hotel
hotel_disbelief.trivia: This song's full title is {i}Can You Really Call This A Hotel, I Didn't Receive A Mint On My Pillow Or Anything.{/i}

snow_blind.title: Snow Blind
snow_blind.trivia: Grace could not stop hugging Santa for the entire scene... It was nice to watch.

christmas_spirit.title: Christmas Spirit
christmas_spirit.trivia: "Dog food is nice... but I don't even own a dog?" -- Elizabeth

rice_and_wine.title: Rice and Wine
rice_and_wine.trivia: Whenever you put a compass near a jukebox with this song playing, it points east. Great for presentations!

winter_unclearance_sale.title: All I Want For Christmas Is You
winter_unclearance_sale.trivia: Whenever you put a compass near a jukebox with this song playing, it points north. Great for Christmas!

superstar_road.title: Superstar Road
superstar_road.trivia: Whenever you put a compass near a jukebox with this song playing, it points up. Great for secret worlds!

ce_passport.title: Christmas Passport
ce_passport.trivia: Aria cheats and Tate cheats and everyone cheats! God {i}damn{/i} it!

snowman.title: Snowman
snowman.trivia: "This song makes me feel peaceful..." -- Mika

dont_preheat_your_oven.title: Don't Preheat Your Oven
dont_preheat_your_oven.trivia: The full name of this song is {i}Don't Preheat Your Oven Because If You Do The Song Won't Play.{/i}

summer_fun.title: Summer Fun // Lecherous Beaches
summer_fun.trivia: How can anyone listen to this?! (/s)

crashing_down.title: Crashing Down
crashing_down.trivia: How can anyone listen to this, part 2?! (/s, part 2)

on_the_rocks.title: On The Rocks
on_the_rocks.trivia: "I still don't know how the Handy Switch worked... one of life's great mysteries I suppose." -- Mika

rhythm_heaven_superb.title: Results: Superb!
rhythm_heaven_superb.trivia: Technically, in {i}Rhythm Heaven{/i}, you'd get this rating if you got any score above a certain threshold, not just a Perfect, but the {i}Carrot Chop{/i} minigame doesn't allow for score that granular.

title_theme_reprise.title: Title Theme Reprise
title_theme_reprise.trivia: "I unironically listen to {i}Scott the Woz{/i} music a lot. It's surprisingly good!" -- Mika

christmas_tea.title: Christmas Tea
christmas_tea.trivia: The unofficial DPN / {i}CSBIII{/i} theme song, remixed for the season. Digi had a lot of help from Baker to understand how FL Studio works, as well as from Tate and Pakoo with choosing samples and harmonies, but they're still proud that they were able to make something musical.

tmwstw.title: The Man Who Sold The World
tmwstw.trivia: It's got a nice radio filter. Tate thought the artist was David Bowie, but this is the version by Midge Ure that is in {i}Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain.{/i}

lets_hear_my_sped.title: Let's Hear My Speed
lets_hear_my_sped.trivia: A sped-up version of {i}Let's Hear My Baby.{/i}

mid_boss_battle.title: Mid Boss Battle
mid_boss_battle.trivia: "For Plane Route, I wanted to use the same OSTs that Tate used for Train Route." -- Pakoo

title_screen.title: Title Screen
title_screen.trivia: "I had to find a way to talk about the airport the same way Tate made it interesting to walk around the train station." -- Pakoo

cobalt_coast_day.title: Cobalt Coast ~ Day
cobalt_coast_day.trivia: "Since Train Route had multiple cars and rooms for CS and Arceus to stay in, the most logical solution to make this work on a plane was for them to ride in an Airbus." -- Pakoo

abra_shop.title: Abra Shop
abra_shop.trivia: "As much as I wanted to bring back {i}Bedroom ~ Day{/i} for this route as it has become one of my favorite songs used in the game, I had to find something similar enough to fit for the route." -- Pakoo

huge_pillar.title: Huge Pillar
huge_pillar.trivia: "I had to find a song that fit the same vibe as {i}Item Bounce{/i}, and this was the closest I got." -- Pakoo

pyrite_town.title: Pyrite Town
pyrite_town.trivia: "Arceus goes to the dining car to meet Mean in Train Route, so I created K-19 to serve as the "Mean" for Plane Route." -- Pakoo

cipher_lab.title: Cipher Lab
cipher_lab.trivia: "Since Train Route had a few scenes from the point-of-view of Lupin III, I decided to swap the perspective to the main crew doing detective work." -- Pakoo

run_for_your_life.title: Run For Your Life!
run_for_your_life.trivia: The original MIDI is from the {i}OpenTTD{/i} OST.

sub_game_select.title: Sub-Game Select
sub_game_select.trivia: {i}Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards{/i} is Tate's all-time favorite video game.

outdoors.title: Outdoors
outdoors.trivia: Getting this track to loop cleanly in Train Route was a painful experience.

hide_and_seek.title: Hide And Seek
hide_and_seek.trivia: Tate wanted something cute-sounding for the toy trains minigame. One day, YouTube delivered with a legendary algorithm pull.

ochre_woods_day.title: Ochre Woods ~ Day
ochre_woods_day.trivia: "One time a classmate posted an Instagram story from the inside of an Amtrak train and were somewhat impressed by me guessing what train it was." -- Mika

bedroom_day.title: Bedroom ~ Day
bedroom_day.trivia: {i}Beats To Travel Across The Country To.{/i}

item_bounce.title: Item Bounce
item_bounce.trivia: "This song makes me feel jumpy!" -- Mika

krabby_klub.title: Krabby Klub
krabby_klub.trivia: This track, with its short intro piece, required a total refactor of the way looping songs are handled in-game.

prof_kranes_kidnap.title: Prof. Krane's Kidnap
prof_kranes_kidnap.trivia: Also do not become a criminal. It doesn't look good on your rap sheet.

e_gadds_lab.title: E. Gadd's Lab
e_gadds_lab.trivia: Whenever you put a compass near a jukebox with this song playing, it points down. E. Gadd is in hell.

encounter_friend.title: Encounter! Friend
encounter_friend.trivia: They should've just shot Lupin. It would've saved everyone a lot of time.

lo_fi_sunset.title: Lo-Fi Sunset
lo_fi_sunset.trivia: Nothing like watching the sunset from a window.

insomnia.title: Insomnia
insomnia.trivia: Tate was never originally intended to be a character that could be battled. {a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O6i-aE4Hw18}{i}Moon EP{/i}{/a} changed that.

nyan_of_a_lifetime.title: Nyan Of A Lifetime
nyan_of_a_lifetime.trivia: The Tate EX story arc was nearly complete when this track showed up in Tate's SoundCloud recommended feed one day. This is {i}only{/i} reason why Perfect Tate exists.

sfx_ringtone_billy.title: Billy Milly Mays
sfx_ringtone_billy.trivia: Originally, this ringtone was CS and Arceus publically urinating, but we fired the guy who did that.

sfx_ringtone_cs.title: Oh Yes Rave
sfx_ringtone_cs.trivia: Originally created for CS' Mixer livestream soundboard, but was also featured in {a=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mh6aM8uhrEI}{i}[[YTP] National Giraffeic Teaches You Slnimals.{/i}{/a}

sfx_ringtone_tate.title: Now Or Never (sleepingSYUN Arrange)
sfx_ringtone_tate.trivia: The real-life Tate has used this ringtone for over a decade.

sfx_ringtone_tate_alt.title: Only One
sfx_ringtone_tate_alt.trivia: This is a real ringtone that Tate used... at some point.
